news_header: Pope Francis, 88, is hospitalized for treatment of bronchitis and a polymicrobial infection in his respiratory tract. The Vatican states he will remain in the hospital as needed and has canceled his weekly audience.
news_original_title: Pope's health a 'complex clinical situation', Vatican says
news_text: The Pope has been experiencing health issues for several days and was advised to rest for recovery. He has previously been hospitalized for similar conditions and has a history of health problems.
